docs.lead_paragraph: As sassy stylist Sophia Burset on Netflix's women's prison drama "Orange Is the New Black," actress Laverne Cox has marked a milestone in the portrayal of transgender characters and was the first transgender actress to land an acting Emmy nomination.

headline.main: A Minute With: Laverne Cox on 'Orange' and Transgender Activism
headline.print_headline: A Minute With: Laverne Cox on 'Orange' and Transgender Activism

docs.snippet: As sassy stylist Sophia Burset on Netflix's women's prison drama "Orange Is the New Black," actress Laverne Cox has marked a milestone in the portrayal of transgender characters and was the first transgender actress to land an acting Emmy nomination.

docs.lead_paragraph: New types of allowance paid to bankers are nearly all in breach of the European Union's cap on bonuses and must be changed by the end of the year, the EU banking watchdog said on Wednesday, raising the prospect that banks will have to bump up basic pay or risk losing top staff.

headline.main: EU Watchdog Says Bankers' Allowances Breach Bonus Rule
headline.print_headline: EU Watchdog Says Bankers' Allowances Breach Bonus Rule

docs.snippet: New types of allowance paid to bankers are nearly all in breach of the European Union's cap on bonuses and must be changed by the end of the year, the EU banking watchdog said on Wednesday, raising the prospect that banks will have to bump up basic...

docs.lead_paragraph: Consumer advocates and policy experts are urging consumers not to put their insurance renewal on autopilot.

headline.main: Back to HealthCare.Gov to Shop for Plans in Open-Enrollment Period for 2015

docs.lead_paragraph: Some tech employers are offering to pay for egg freezing as a perk, but it could also be seen as paying women to put off childbearing.

headline.main: Freezing Eggs as Part of Employee Benefits: Some Women See Darker Message

docs.snippet: Some tech employers are offering to pay for egg freezing as a perk, but it could also be seen as paying women to put off childbearing.

docs.lead_paragraph: State officials plan to cancel coverage for about 10,500 people participating in the state health insurance exchange because they could not prove that they were citizens or legal residents of the United States.
docs.abstract: Covered California, state-run insurance exchange, says they plan to cancel coverage for about 10,500 people who did not provide proof of citizenship or legal residency necessary to be covered under the Affordable Care Act; follows similar actions in Florida and Texas.
docs.snippet: State officials plan to cancel coverage for about 10,500 people participating in the state health insurance exchange because they could not prove that they were citizens or legal residents of the United States.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: The state-appointed board that oversees the city’s school district canceled the teachers’ union contract and required them to contribute to health care premiums.

headline.main: Philadelphia Teachers Hit by Latest Cuts
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Teachers Hit by Latest Cuts

docs.abstract: Philadelphia teachers are struggling with latest round of city budget cuts after state-appointed board that oversees city’s school district cancels teachers’ union contract and requires them to contribute to health care premiums.
docs.snippet: The state-appointed board that oversees the city’s school district canceled the teachers’ union contract and required them to contribute to health care premiums.
